visor.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the part of a helmet (=protective hard hat) that can be lowered to protect your face
visor.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the curved part of a cap that sticks out in front above your eyes
visor.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a flat object fixed above the front window inside a car that can be moved down to keep the sun out of your eyes
visor.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a curved piece of plastic that you wear on your head so that it sticks out above your eyes and protects them from the sun
